advancements.lightmanscurrency.ancient_c: Find an ancient coin in a suspicious area
advancements.lightmanscurrency.atm.descr: Craft an ATM Machine. You can use this to manually exchange coins and access your bank accounts
advancements.lightmanscurrency.atm.title: Now you're thinking with Banking
advancements.lightmanscurrency.banker_tr: Buy a currency-related item from a banker
advancements.lightmanscurrency.cash_regi: Craft a cash register so that players can interact with all of your nearby traders at once!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.cashier_t: Buy something for coins from a cashier
advancements.lightmanscurrency.coin_mint: Craft a Coin Mint so that you can mint your own coins
advancements.lightmanscurrency.enchanted: Enchant your wallet with the Coin Magnet enchantment
advancements.lightmanscurrency.event.cho: Play during a special holiday! Unlocks the ability to use chocolate coins as money
advancements.lightmanscurrency.event.chr: Played during a very jolly time!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.event.val: Played during the celebration of love
advancements.lightmanscurrency.jar_of_su: WHY DID IT HAVE TO BE SOUP!?
advancements.lightmanscurrency.nether_st: Craft a wallet from a nether star. Only for those with a true need for coin storage!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.netherite: Craft a netherite wallet, one of the largest and most resilient wallets around!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.network_t: Craft a network trader so that you can sell your items to anyone, anywhere!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.root.desc: Collecting wealth and trading with players
advancements.lightmanscurrency.specialty: Craft a specialty item trader. Be careful, as they have special rules limiting how their trades are defined
Craft a Trading Terminal. This will let you access network traders from anywhere
advancements.lightmanscurrency.trader.de: Craft any Trader so that you can trade with your friends!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.trader_in: Craft a trader interface so that you can automate trading or restocking with a network trader!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.trading_c: Craft a Trading Core! These are needed to make trading machines to trade from
advancements.lightmanscurrency.wallet_cr: Craft your first wallet. You can use these to store your coins!

permission.lightmanscurrency.addRemoveAl: Allows the player to add or remove other players (or themselves) from the list of Allies
permission.lightmanscurrency.bankLink.to: Allows the player to enable or disable the 'Link to Bank Account' setting
permission.lightmanscurrency.breakTrader: Allows the player to break the machine in the world. Also required to pick up the trader as an item to be moved elsewhere
permission.lightmanscurrency.changeExter: Allows the player to change which sides of the machine can have product inserted or extracted from them
Allows player to change the traders display name & custom icon
permission.lightmanscurrency.collectCoin: Allows the player to collect money from this traders internal money storage
permission.lightmanscurrency.editPermiss: Allows the player to edit the permissions exactly as you are
permission.lightmanscurrency.editSetting: Allows the player to access most settings in the main Settings tab. Required for players to utilize other settings-related permissions (like the Display Settings permission)
permission.lightmanscurrency.editTradeRu: Allows the player to activate, deactivate, and otherwise edit the Trade Rules attached to this trader or its trades (Edit Trades permissions required to edit Trade-Specific rules)
Allows player to create remove and modify the trades
permission.lightmanscurrency.interaction: Allows the player to set up a Trader Interface that can automatically restock and/or drain product from this machines storage
permission.lightmanscurrency.openStorage: Allows player to access the Storage Menu and add or remove items from the traders storage.
Allows the player to store money to this traders internal money storage
permission.lightmanscurrency.transferOwn: Allows the player to change the owner of this machine to any valid player or team
permission.lightmanscurrency.viewLogs.to: Allows the player to view this machines interaction logs
